attributes.action: Give all NHS staff in England a one-off bonus of £500.
attributes.additional_details: The proposed 1% pay rise is an insult. The pandemic heroes deserve better.
attributes.background: If we can afford furlough, we can afford recognising the real heroes of this pandemic! There are approx. 1m NHS staff, so the total cost of this would be approx. £500m. It's worth it!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
